list.abs: 船歌船歌（barcarolle)源出意大利文barca，意为“船”。是威尼斯船家之哥。常用6/8或12/8拍，其伴奏模拟小船荡漾。后.
barcarole 船歌barcarolle 威尼斯的船歌Barcelona 巴塞罗纳

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French barcarolle, from Venetian Italian barcarola 'boatman's song', from barca 'boat'

means.word_mean: 1. a boating song sung by Venetian gondoliers
